participant_1.background:

I am a tour guide at the Grand Canyon.
i don t like music.

i am a closet cannibal.

content.text: Hey! I am a big fan of Christmas and love painting. What do you like to do in your free time?
Hi! Me too, I love painting and I also enjoy spending time with my family. What's your favorite Christmas memory?
I have a lot of great Christmas memories, but one of my favorites is when I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
That sounds like an amazing experience! I've never been hiking in the mountains before, but I'd love to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
Yeah, I think I will. I've been feeling a little cooped up lately, so I think some fresh air would do me some good.
I'm glad to hear that. I hope you have a great time!
By the way, what kind of paintings do you like to do?
I like to do all sorts of different paintings, but I'm especially fond of landscapes and portraits.
Oh, that's cool! I love landscapes too. I'm not very good at painting portraits, but I'm trying to get better.
It's all about practice. The more you do it, the better you'll get.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll keep practicing.
You're welcome! I'm sure you'll be great.
